metahuman.label: MetaHuman / Unreal (tooling)
metahuman.q: metahuman (unreal OR livelink OR arkit OR facial OR rig)

items.name: see2023/Bert-VITS2-ext
items.description: Bert-VITS2. Animation testing based on Bert-VITS2.

items.name: poly-hammer/meta-human-dna-addon
items.description: Imports MetaHuman head and body components into Blender from a their DNA files, lets you customize them, then send them back to MetaHuman Creator.

items.name: swnolan/metahuman_facial_transfer
items.description: Extracts/Transfers Metahuman Facial from exported FBX onto Maya face control board

items.name: chrisevans3d/poseWrangler
items.description: A simple visual front end to the Maya UE4 RBF plugin delivered with MetaHumans

items.name: NxRoot/ALSV4-Metahumans
items.description: UE5 - Advanced Locomotion System (Replicated)

items.name: SocAIty/py_audio2face
items.description: Use the NVIDIA Audio2Face headless server and interact with it through a requests API. Generate animation sequences for Unreal Engine 5, Maya and MetaHumans

items.name: SpookyCorgi/phiz
items.description: Phiz is a tool that allows you to perform facial motion capture from any device and location.

items.name: vinjn/llm-metahuman
items.description: An open solution for AI-powered photorealistic digital humans.

generative.label: Generative Talking Heads (repos)
generative.q: "talking head" (realtime OR real-time OR streaming OR webrtc OR diffusion)

items.name: AIGC-Audio/AudioGPT
items.description: AudioGPT: Understanding and Generating Speech, Music, Sound, and Talking Head

items.name: OpenTalker/video-retalking
items.description: [SIGGRAPH Asia 2022] VideoReTalking: Audio-based Lip Synchronization for Talking Head Video Editing In the Wild

items.name: Kedreamix/Linly-Talker
items.description: Digital Avatar Conversational System - Linly-Talker.  Linly-Talker is an intelligent AI system that combines large language models (LLMs) with visual models to create a novel human-AI interaction method.  It integrates various technologies like Whisper, Linly, Microsoft Speech Services, and SadTalker talking head generation system.

items.name: yuyuyzl/EasyVtuber
items.description: Based on Talking-head-anime 3, works like Vtube Studio.

items.name: tencent-ailab/V-Express
items.description: V-Express aims to generate a talking head video under the control of a reference image, an audio, and a sequence of V-Kps images.

items.name: pkhungurn/talking-head-anime-demo
items.description: Demo for the "Talking Head Anime from a Single Image."

items.name: ali-vilab/dreamtalk
items.description: Official implementations for paper: DreamTalk: When Expressive Talking Head Generation Meets Diffusion Probabilistic Models

items.name: ZiqiaoPeng/SyncTalk
items.description: [CVPR 2024] This is the official source for our paper "SyncTalk: The Devil is in the Synchronization for Talking Head Synthesis"

items.name: Kedreamix/Awesome-Talking-Head-Synthesis
items.description: An extensive collection of exceptional resources dedicated to the captivating world of talking face synthesis!  If you find this repo useful, please give it a star!
